content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani

content: Hello Juan, welcome to the apartment. Thank you for considering it for your living space. The rental price for this unit is 500 euros per month. Would you like to discuss further or agree to this amount?
name: Juan Mamani

content: I would like to discuss further. What would be your expectations if I were to rent it for a longer period of time?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: If you were to rent the apartment for a longer period of time, I would be happy to offer you a discount on the monthly rent. For a 6-month lease, I could offer a 10% discount, while for a 12-month lease, I could offer a 20% discount. This would make the monthly rental price 450 euros and 380 euros respectively. Would you like to discuss these options further or agree to one of them?
name: Juan Mamani

content:
I would like to discuss further. Can you offer any additional discounts or incentives if I decide to rent it for a longer period of time?
I would like to rent it for a year.

I would like to agree to this price of 380 euros.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for considering my offer. I am glad that 380 euros per month for a 12-month lease is acceptable to you. In addition to the discount, I would like to offer you a free monthly cleaning service for the duration of your lease. This is my way of showing appreciation for your loyalty and commitment to renting from me. Would you like me to put this offer in writing for you to review and agree to?
name: Juan Mamani
